We distinguish between two cases. If i ⩾m, i.e., bi is an eigenvector
that is not among the ﬁrstm−1 principal components, then bi is orthogo-
nal to the ﬁrstm−1 principal components and Bm−1bi = 0. If i<m , i.e.,
bi is among the ﬁrst m−1 principal components, then bi is a basis vector
